item.title: What is the difference between a Web Designer and a Web Developer?
item.dc:creator: Kelley Melgarejo
item.description:
The job titles’ “web designer” and “web developer” may sound like they could be very similar or just about the same for those who are unfamiliar with the job fields. And although it is true that both positions work towards bringing a website to life, the skills, preparation and training associated with each position are […]

item.title: What colors should I use for my brand?
item.dc:creator: Kelley Melgarejo
item.description:
It is important to understand that how consumers feel about a brand has more power than what they think about a brand. Your brand colors have the ability to impact your sales and performance more than the products you offer. Consistency and repetition with the same colors can strengthen brand awareness because when given enough […]

item.title: 7 Powerful Questions to Answer Before You Build Your Brand
item.dc:creator: Kelley Melgarejo
item.description:
